price: 4. Wuxuu ka abuuray aadmiga mino nool, mise, waa dood badane col cad ah2.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: 2. Durba markuu xoog yeesho oo madax bannaanaado.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīnun
